translations: 使引起轰动；以耸人听闻的手法处理（sensationalise 的过去式和过去分词，等于 sensationalized）

sentences.sentence: The French architect had sensationalised seating in 1929 when he turned the conventional club chair inside out so that the the framework, once modestly concealed, became part of the design thrill.
sentences.translation: 这名法国建筑师在1929年设计了这把引起轰动的椅子，他将司空见惯的方形椅里外对翻，将这种一度隐藏在内的构造变得为设计灵感的一部分。
